title: Champion Chest reset date
body:
My Poro bros, Do you guys know when the Champion Chest would reset?

Pre-seaon or Season 8?

replies.body: Hey there, honestly I don't really know until it's been announced.  My guess, speculating here, would be when the new season starts.  You'll want to keep your eyes on our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page to really know for sure.
it will be season 8 with the reset of your rank stats
